entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High zero.
